rows.label: qev018801_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hello, most most loyal Shimmer & Savvy Financial
Group VVIP member. I've been waiting for you,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Your contributions have earned you the very exciting
privilege of becoming a gold VVIP member, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0003
rows.name:
The most most shiniest of all VVIP members,
gold-tier clients receive even better rates when
converting miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0004
rows.name:
And as a very very special bonus, you'll also receive an
even better reward than usual. Good, yes? So so good![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0005
rows.name:
All you need to do is bring me 30 more pieces of
aurorite and 10 more pieces of arc sand ore, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0006
rows.name: Going to go for it? Go go go?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0007
rows.name:
Ah, good. So so good! I will be getting very very close
to the top of New LA's rich list now, won't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0008
rows.name:
It's time to overhaul my marvelous alchemy engines
and put them into hyper hyper mode so they can
explode my savings into even BIGGER savings, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_JNK0010
rows.name: Ask

rows.label: qev018801_SEL0011
rows.name: Find out why May May wants all this money.

rows.label: qev018801_JNK0020
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev018801_SEL0021
rows.name: Forget the details and just cheer May May on.

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0009
rows.name:
When I told my reason to a Nopon, it laughed at me,
you see? Said I was very very strange. But you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0010
rows.name:
Well, perhaps I'll explain my reason as an added
bonus if if if you make it to gold VVIP status?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0011
rows.name:
Oh, thank you. You're so so nice. With those materials
you collect, I will be able to upgrade my marvelous
alchemy engines to be even more more marvelous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Then you can turn lots and lots more miranium into
lots and lots more cash. Er, that is your plan, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0013
rows.name:
Maybe it's time for us to run hand in hand down that
road to riches? So perhaps this is your greatest dash
for cash yet? Good good luck with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0014
rows.name: I'm almost at the top of the New LA rich list, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0015
rows.name:
So keep digging up tons and tons more miranium and
let me convert it into slightly smaller tons and tons of
cash, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0016
rows.name:
Yes. Be sure to keep exchanging lots of miranium even
while you're out finding me that aurorite and arc sand
ore, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0017
rows.name:
Say, have you found the aurorite and arc sand ore
that I asked for yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0018
rows.name: I'll never never top the rich list without them, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0019
rows.name:
Good, good. Now I can overhaul my alchemy engines
and make much much more money than before, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0020
rows.name:
You are officially golden, okay? And along with your
new shiny gold VVIP status, please accept this bonus,
won't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0021
rows.name:
Hee hee! Thanks to your help, I'm at number two in
New LA's rich-person rankings, aren't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0022
rows.name:
So much money, so much happiness, right?
Just look at my hoard of credits![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_JNK0030
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev018801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask what May May plans to buy with all that money.

rows.label: qev018801_JNK0040
rows.name: Pry

rows.label: qev018801_SEL0041
rows.name: Try to figure out how much May May has amassed.

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0023
rows.name:
What? Buy? No, no, no. I'm not buying anything,
am I? If you spend money, it just goes away, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0024
rows.name:
Then it would take even longer to get to number one,
wouldn't it? That's why you have to scrimp and save
and never spend even a single credit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0025
rows.name:
You want an exact amount, do you? Well, it's roughly
209.5 billion, give or take the odd credit?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0026
rows.name:
A lot of scrimping and saving, yes. 
Not a lot of eating, no.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0027
rows.name: ...Huh? What's the point of money, then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0028
rows.name:
It's a way to calculate just how very very awesome my
alchemy engines are, isn't it? Like points? A point total?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0029
rows.name:
I have to keep racking up points and obtain the
highest score ever. Because then I'll be...happy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_JNK0050
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev018801_SEL0051
rows.name: Shake your head at May May.

rows.label: qev018801_JNK0060
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev018801_SEL0061
rows.name: Nod as if that makes perfect sense.

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0030
rows.name: Perhaps you think about it like the Nopon do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0031
rows.name:
They also think it's a waste to just keep all of my
money, don't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0032
rows.name:
But there's nothing I really really want except the
high score. ...That makes sense, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0033
rows.name:
You're no simple gold VVIP member, you know?
You're a kindred money spirit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018801_MSG0034
rows.name:
Let's earn much much more and become the richest
friends Mira has ever seen, okay?[ST:wait ]
